# excel_project_2
## Transforming data range into table
### Removing duplicate values
### Questions /Insights

**Quantity of products by  category wise using sumif function**
>=SUMIF(Table1[category],D5,Table1[quantiy])

**Quantity of products by category wise and gender wise using sumifs function**
>=SUMIFS(Table1[quantiy],Table1[gender],D7,Table1[category],E7)

**Total Sales amount by category wise using sumif function**
>=SUMIF(Table1[category],D9,Table1[total_sale])

**Total Sales generated by gender wise and category wise using sumifs function**
>=SUMIFS(Table1[total_sale],Table1[gender],E11,Table1[category],D11)

**How many customers purchased in each category using countif function**
>=COUNTIF(Table1[category],D13)

**Checking How many customers purchased by category and gender wise using countifs function**
>=COUNTIFS(Table1[category],D15,Table1[gender],E15)

**Checking Total sales amount generated by category wise  and monthwise using sumifs function**
>=SUMIFS(Table1[total_sale],Table1[Month],D17,Table1[category],E17,Table1[Year],F17)

**Checking what product customer purchased with transaction_id using xlookup function**
>=XLOOKUP(I4,Table1[transactions_id],Table1[category])

**Checking max quantity of orders by category wise using maxifs function**
>=MAXIFS(Table1[quantiy],Table1[category],I6)

**Checking minimum quantity of orders by category wise using minifs function**
>=MINIFS(Table1[quantiy],Table1[category],I8)

**Checking transaction amount with transaction_id using index and match function**
>=INDEX(Table1[total_sale],MATCH(I10,Table1[customer_id],0))

**Checking Total profit generated by each category using sumif function**
>=SUMIF(Table1[category],I12,Table1[Profit])

**Checking total sales quantity with weekday tpe using sumif function**
>=SUMIF(Table1[Week_Day_Type],I14,Table1[quantiy])

**Checking total sales amount with weekday type using sumif function**
>=SUMIF(Table1[Week_Day_Type],I16,Table1[total_sale])

**Checking how many customers purchased by weekday type**
>=COUNTIF(Table1[Week_Day_Type],I18)
